Title: Enacts the safeguarding employees and accountability for termination act
Summary: Establishes certain rights and remedies for employees who are wrongfully discharged; establishes remedies for wrongful discharge; allows an employee or employer to make a written offer to arbitrate a dispute covered under this act; defines terms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to enacting the safeguarding employees and accountability for termination act
